name: TheShark
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the shark radio official
des:
The best of hair metal and melodic rock lives on The Shark. We rock the classic bands and more from the 80’s and 90’s like Skid Row, Tesla, Bon Jovi, Motley Crue, Whitesnake and more. We also play today’s new melodic rock, which sounds just like the rock of the 80s. Bands like Revolution Saints, Hell In The Club, Wig Wam, Edge Of Forever, H.E.A.T. and more!

We also have some characters hosting shows that you wanna check out. We bring some of our own shows like New Bangers, Monster Rock and more. We carry some great syndicated shows like Streets of Rock N Roll hosted by Ron Keel, Back To The Arena, Hair On The Air, and Noize In The Attic.

If you like that hair metal and melodic rock sound, you have found your new station! The Shark, where hair metal lives on!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
